page.syntax: Handle as N = Relation_Tag(C expression[,C Filter[,C Flags]])

argument.name: expression
argument.description: A character order expression that sorts selected records.

argument.name: Filter
argument.description: A character filter expression that selects records in the table.

argument.name: Flags
argument.description: Optional. Default = "" (Ascending, not unique). A string of character flags that can specify a descending sort order ('D'), and or include only records with unique key values ('U').

page.description: Builds and Returns an index handle for the relation_change and relation_add commands.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.RELATION_TAG() method builds an index tag in the production index file for the table, and returns a handle for the index. It is used in conjunction with the <TBL>.RELATION_ADD() and <TBL>.RELATION_CHANGE() methods.
page.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.open("customer") ? tbl.relation_tag("left(lastname,1) + left(firstname,1)") = 83951618.000000
